2.rationale:
Let's think this through...

I'm currently at position (9, 6) and there are apples at (9, 1) and (9, 7). I can try to go for the apple at (9, 1) by moving down, but that would put me in a corner and limit my options. On the other hand, I can try to go for the apple at (9, 7) by moving up, which would give me more flexibility and potentially set me up for future moves.

Additionally, I should keep an eye on Snake #1 at position (6, 9), but it's not an immediate threat.

My strategy for next turn will be to try to get the apple at (9, 7) and then reassess the board state.

My decided next move is: UP.
